ygData.subject: Re: Putting Skill-Cap Questions to Rest
ygData.msgSnippet: Also - add the level we get the skill Slyde ... From: Mike Roach  To:  Sent: Tuesday, September 28, 1999 2:37 PM
ygData.messageBody:
Also - add the level we get the skill

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 28, 1999 2:37 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Putting Skill-Cap Questions to Rest


> From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
>
> I am trying to put together a comprehensive reference chart on all the
skill
> caps for skills that bards can have, including general skills and trade
> skills. I have data for most of the bard-specific ones but am missing
info
> on some others, maybe some of you folks could help me fill in the blanks
> (note that ones I was uncertain of I simply put a value of 200 - please
> correct me if I am wrong):
>
> Alcohol Tolerance: 200
> Baking: 200
